name: nlog
description: Guidance for NLog logging framework in .NET. USE FOR: NLog target configuration, layout renderers, structured logging with NLog, async logging, conditional routing, custom targets, NLog integration with ASP.NET Core. DO NOT USE FOR: Microsoft.Extensions.Logging abstractions (use extensions-logging), Serilog sinks and enrichers (use serilog), OpenTelemetry log export (use otlp-logging).
author: Tyler-R-Kendrick
